ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the identifier for t
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the identifier for the medical history event that was reported as a clinically significant ECG finding?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Identifier for the medical history event that was reported as a clinically significant ECG finding.

ReferenceDocuments.name: N/A
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission datasets, may be used to create RELREC to link this record with a record in the Medical History domain.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Intent is to establish a link between the clinically significant ECG finding and the medical history event that was reported. EGMHNO can be used in RELREC to identify a relationship between records in EG dataset and records in the MH dataset. See section 8.2 in the SDTMIG V3.2 for information on RELREC.
